Uses of Class
adept.common.Item

  • Packages that use Item 
    Package Description
    adept.common
    Provides common data structures for use in the ADEPT framework, including the input Document and its TokenStream containing every Token, and the output HltContentContainer containing multiple kinds of annotations, such as EntityMention and Relation, which are based on the Chunk class.
    adept.data
    Provides interfaces for accessing databases and knowledge-bases such as NELL and the Paraphrase Database (PPDB).

      Represents a thread where the messages are successive chunks of text, including the authors who are participants in the thread.

      The Class Coreference, which is a relationship between two or more words or phrases in which both refer to the same entity and one stands as a linguistic antecedent of the other.

      The Class Entity, which is a thing in concrete or abstract reality that can be identified by its distinct properties, for example persons, organizations, locations, expressions of times, quantities and monetary values.
      class  EntityMention
      The Class EntityMention, which is a sequence of tokens that refer to an Entity with mention type that is drawn from an ontology
      class  Event
      The Class Event, which represents something that happens or is regarded as happening; an occurrence, especially one of some importance.
      class  EventMention
      Represents an event where the arguments are particular chunks of text which may or may not be further resolved.
      class  EventMentionArgument

      class  HltContent
      The Class HltContent is an abstract class that represents all the HLT content generated by DEFT algorithms.
      class  HltContentContainer
      The Class HltContentContainer, which contains the full annotation of an input Document, including objects such as Coreference, EntityMention, Event, Passage, Relation and Sentence.
